name: Splatformer
description:
Welcome to Splatformer a fast paced, challenging, puzzle platformer where your splats paint the world.

Try to make your way through each puzzle while navigating invisible traps. If you fail you will splat all over the world around you: revealing more of the path and making it easier to find your way to the exit.

Try, try, and try again.

Take your time to reveal the entire level or rush through to finish in as little time as possible. The play style is up to you.

How To Play:
Move left - A
Move right - D
Jump - Space
Self Destruct - E
Fast reset level - R
Fast move to next level - Enter
